name: Ilvenilia
description:
Made for the "All you do is click click click" game jam. #clickclickclick

Ilvenilia is a clicker set in an unnamed desert on a faraway world. You are helping guide the growth of a civilization of tiny people known as "ilfs" who are grown from and worship the magic energy of a white tree known as the "the il". 

Click the sigil at the base of the tree to pray to the il, it will increase the flow of magic. Build structures to house the ilfs and places for them to worship the il. As you increase both the power of your prayers will also grow. Soon you'll have a thriving metropolis of ilfs!
